channel.title: Documentation on tangly Components
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on tangly Components

item.title: Contributing Guidelines
item.description: This is an open source product. We love getting patches and contributions to make our components, and their documentation even better. Contributing to tangly Open Source Components The components live in Open Source Components. The git repository and the issue tracker are public and accessible to all interested parties. You can create the set of git remotes with the following instructions. git remote add origin-github git@github.com:marcelbaumann/tangly-os.git (1) git remote add origin-gitlab git@gitlab.

item.title: Development Environment
item.description: The development environment is MacOS [1]. Java JDKs Install Java development kits. You should at least install the last released version and the last LTS version. We use the distributions of Oracle. alias java17 = "export JAVA_HOME=`/usr/libexec/java_home -v 17`; java -version" alias java19 = "export JAVA_HOME=`/usr/libexec/java_home -v 19`; java -version" alias java20 = "export JAVA_HOME=`/usr/libexec/java_home -v 20`; java -version" Tools We use brew to install. The following tools shall be installed [2].
